messages.subject: Re: Anyone going to the northeast unschooling conference?
messages.msgSnippet: Mysteriously enough, my family is going. :) I just got back from a visit to the new hotel, and I m really excited. There s lots of good space, the hotel is
messages.messageBody:
Mysteriously enough, my family is going. :)

I just got back from a visit to the new hotel, and I'm really excited.
There's lots of good space, the hotel is nice and they're friendly. If you need
a relaxing break, the hotel is adjacent to a large nature preserve open
for hiking. We have a lot of fun things planned.

If you are planning to come, Please make hotel reservations soon! We have
almost filled our block, and I may be able to increase it soon, but the
closer we come the more possible it is that we'll run out of rooms.

Please come! It's a great way to connect with other unschoolers.

Kathryn Baptista

Come to the Northeast Unschooling Conference August 27-30, 2009 in
Wakefield, Massachusetts _www.northeastunschoolingconference.com_
(http://www.northeastunschoolingconference.com/)

**************Dell Deals: Donâ€™t miss huge summer savings on popular laptops
starting at $449.
